title: Ties to the Blood Moon
description: Genevieve Labreck, is a teenage girl who moves to her aunt's home in Alaska just before the death of her mom.Soon after her arrival, Genevieve learns the things she was raised to believe only existed in fairytales are, in fact, a big part of her history.When it all gets to be too much, she seeks refuge in the arms of her new boyfriend, William, only to find out he's not who she thought he was either.This is a Young Adult paranormal/fantasy romance with mild language and mild sexual situations recommended for readers in grade 9 and up
author: Robin P. Waldrop
